lore.thwackinator.thwackinator: A comically large hammer that sends you flying backwards with every hit. Attack with a running start to deal more damage and get flung further!
lore.thwackinator.thwackinator_rod: A crafting ingredient used to make the Thwackinator.
lore.thwackinator.thwackinator_thwackpad: A crafting ingredient used to make the Thwackinator.
